00002 #
00003 #  Implements the list of named constants.
00004 #
00005 package Parser::Context::Constants;
00006 use strict;
00007 our @ISA = qw(Value::Context::Data);
00008 
00009 sub init {
00010   my $self = shift;
00011   $self->{dataName} = 'constants';
00012   $self->{name} = 'constant';
00013   $self->{Name} = 'Constant';
00014   $self->{namePattern} = qr/[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*|_blank_/;
00015   $self->{tokenType} = 'const';
00016 }
00017 
00018 #
00019 #  Create/Uncreate data for constants
00020 #
00021 sub create {
00022   my $self = shift; my $value = shift;
00023   return $value if ref($value) eq 'HASH';
00024   return {value => $value, keepName => 1};
00025 }
00026 sub uncreate {shift; (shift)->{value}}
00027 
00028 #
00029 #  Return a constant's value
00030 #
00031 sub value {
00032   my $self = shift; my $x = shift;
00033   return $self->{context}{constants}{$x}{value};
00034 }
